To start, we need to load all necessary data and make sure it has the coordinate reference system.

shapefile for the West Coast EEZ
bathymetry raster
SST rasters
combine SST rasters into a raster stack

## Setup Code
1.  Loading necessary libraries
```{r}
#| output: false
# Read in necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(here)
library(tmap)
library(patchwork)
library(stars)
```


2.  Importing data
```{r}
#| output: false
# Load data in

eez <- st_read(here("data", "wc_regions_clean.shp"))

depth <- stars::read_stars(here("data", "depth.tif"))

sst_2008 <- stars::read_stars(here("data", "average_annual_sst_2008.tif"))

sst_2009 <- stars::read_stars(here("data", "average_annual_sst_2009.tif"))
  
sst_2010 <- stars::read_stars(here("data", "average_annual_sst_2010.tif"))

sst_2011 <- stars::read_stars(here("data", "average_annual_sst_2011.tif"))

sst_2012 <- stars::read_stars(here("data", "average_annual_sst_2012.tif"))
  
```
